summary: A purple-ish pink-ish retexture of glass armor, upped to 2048x2048
descriptionHtml:
I like how it turned out, so I wanted to share. 
If you have any pointers on how to make this better, go ahead and share. 
Weapons included! 
I made Chillrend a little more red, so if you don\'t like it there\'s a pretty easy solution; copy the glassword.dds and rename it to glassword_chillrend.dds. Both textures are the same except the color.
_______________________________________________________________________________________

Since I\'ve made all of these 2048x2048 (high resolution textures), they may be too hard for some people to run (I really hope not... it would take a crappy computer to not run these well), but if you need/want I can make a lower resolution pack as well.
author: Halosheep
